attributes.action: English citizens priority on the council housing list before immigrants refugees
attributes.background: I am a single mother on the waiting list for a council property and facing homelessness in just 10 days and am being told I might not even get a property from the council as there are already so many on the waiting list!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107787 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
